name: @nicolasflamel/ed25519-native
description: Node.js addon for parts of SUPERCOP's Ed25519 implementation

scripts.preinstall: wget "https://bench.cr.yp.to/supercop/supercop-20220213.tar.xz" && unxz < "./supercop-20220213.tar.xz" | tar -xf - && sed -i 's/static const unsigned char zero\[32\];/static const unsigned char zero[32] = {0};/g' "./supercop-20220213/crypto_sign/ed25519/ref10/fe_isnonzero.c" && wget -O "./ed25519-wrapper.zip" "https://github.com/NicolasFlamel1/Ed25519-WASM-Wrapper/archive/refs/heads/master.zip" && unzip "./ed25519-wrapper.zip"

author: Nicolas Flamel
